findings.title: MT - Mint Tokens
findings.description: The contract owner has the authority to mint tokens, which can lead to token inflation if abused.

findings.title: Burn Tokens
findings.description: The contract owner has the authority to burn tokens from a specific address, which can lead to token loss if abused.

findings.title: Public Function could be Declared External
findings.description: Public functions that are never called by the contract should be declared external to save gas.

findings.title: State Variables could be Declared Constant
findings.description: Constant state variables should be declared constant to save gas.

findings.title: Unused State Variable
findings.description: There are segments that contain unused state variables.

findings.title: Conformance to Solidity Naming Conventions
findings.description: Solidity defines a naming convention that should be followed.

findings.title: Using Variables before Declaration
findings.description: The contract is using a variable before the declaration.

findings.title: Local Scope Variable Shadowing
findings.description: The variables are defined in the local scope containing the same name from an upper scope.

findings.title: Uninitialized Variables in Local Scope
findings.description: There are variables that are defined in the local scope and are not initialized.
